Content: There is no upper limit for the lender fee [HomeFi.sol#L194](https://github.com/code-423n4/2022-08-rigor/blob/f2498c86dbd0e265f82ec76d9ec576442e896a87/contracts/HomeFi.sol#L194). Consider enforcing a limit of 1,000 (or even something like 200) to avoid errors and give users an upper limit for the fee.
